name: Tap Tap Balls
description:
Tap Tap Balls is a very simple yet addictive elimination game. You tap groups of 3 or more same balls. Tap as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Try to tap balls with star on it which will bring you special benefits. Gear up for this addictive and relaxing game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
Very cute and clean graphics.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.
It's good for any age.
Mindless fun.
Great way to pass time.

Enjoy!
